hero.subtitle: Enjoy Local-Level Development Experience in Agent Containers

pain_points.title: Pain Points of Traditional Mode
pain_points.subtitle: Common problems when developing components in AI Agent containers

box.title: Host Black Box
box.desc: Must deploy to container to debug, no visibility into host details, making debugging extremely difficult

slow.title: Slow Feedback
slow.desc: Rebuild and deploy for every change, no Hot Module Replacement (HMR), low efficiency

prod.title: Hard to Debug Prod
prod.desc: Cannot set breakpoints or view logs like local env, troubleshooting is like finding a needle in a haystack

conflict.title: Runtime Conflicts
conflict.desc: Resource 404s, React instance conflicts between container and component, causing Hooks errors

solutions.title: dev-to Solutions
solutions.subtitle: A complete toolchain to solve component development challenges in agent containers

hmr.title: Cross-Env HMR
hmr.desc: Vite dev locally, real-time HMR in container, instant feedback

debug.title: Prod-Level Debug
debug.desc: Load local dev components in production containers temporarily, debug with breakpoints like local

standard.title: Standard Protocol
standard.desc: Unified component loading spec, decoupling container and component, supporting multi-team collaboration

tools.title: Full Toolchain
tools.desc: Built-in debug panel, dev-to build (UMD), scaffolding. Out-of-the-box solution

assets.title: Auto Asset Handling
assets.desc: CSS, images, fonts automatically redirected to Vite Dev Server, no more 404s

transparent.title: Fully Transparent
transparent.desc: Source maps, logs, and breakpoints work perfectly, just like local development

architecture.title: Architecture Design
architecture.subtitle: Collaboration model between container and component providers
architecture.mode_dev_desc: Container loads localhost components ‚Üí Real-time HMR
architecture.mode_prod_desc: Container loads CDN UMD bundles ‚Üí Stable Run
architecture.mode_debug_desc: Switch to localhost temporarily ‚Üí Debug like local

scenarios.title: Usage Scenarios
scenarios.subtitle: Suitable for various scenarios requiring dynamic loading of third-party components

agent.title: AI Agent Platform
agent.desc: Unified agent platform where business lines or third parties provide agent cards (assistants, dashboards, etc.)

micro.title: Micro-Frontend
micro.desc: Dynamically load sub-application React components in main app, independent maintenance

lowcode.title: Low-Code Plugin
lowcode.desc: Platform provides capabilities, developers provide custom extensions

electron.title: Electron App
electron.desc: Load independently developed plugins in Electron main window

packages.title: Core Packages
packages.subtitle: Complete toolchain covering the entire component development lifecycle
packages.cli_desc: üöÄ CLI - Quickly create projects integrated with dev-to
packages.plugin_desc: ‚ö° Vite Plugin - Expose stable bridge entry on Vite Dev Server
packages.loader_desc: üîå Host Loader - Dynamically load remote React components in any page
packages.shared_desc: üì° Protocol - Communication protocol and type definitions

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.subtitle: Create cross-env HMR components in 30s, update in real-time in any container

step1.title: Create with CLI
step1.desc: CLI installs dependencies, configures Vite, generating Hello World component

step2.title: Manual Config
step2.desc: For existing projects, install @dev-to/react-plugin and configure manually

step3.title: Host Integration
step3.comment: // Host app code, maintained by container team
step3.desc: Component developers ignore this. It's for the container/host team

footer.desc: React Component Dev Toolchain for AI Agent Platforms
